guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.description: Our community thrives when everyone follows these simple guidelines.
guidelines.beRespectfulDesc: Treat all members with kindness and respect. We come from diverse backgrounds and skill levels. Celebrate differences and be supportive of everyone's quilting journey.
guidelines.keepConstructiveDesc: When offering feedback or critique, be constructive and helpful. Focus on the work, not the person. Remember that everyone is here to learn and grow.
guidelines.shareAuthenticDesc: Share your own original work and give proper credit when using others' patterns or designs. Respect copyright and intellectual property rights.
guidelines.beInclusiveDesc: Quilters Unite welcomes quilters of all backgrounds, skill levels, and styles. Help create an environment where everyone feels welcome.
